product_name: Mountain Hardwear TrinaLake Plaid Shirt - Women's
long_description: The women's Mountain Hardwear TrinaLake Plaid Shirt looks and feels like cotton seersucker, but its performance fabric wicks moisture and dries fast so you stay comfy hiking and traveling. Super-lightweight polyester/nylon fabric resists wrinkles. Mountain Hardwear TrinaLake Plaid Shirt features shaping darts, 2 chest pockets and a curved hem.
short_description: The women's Mountain Hardwear TrinaLake Plaid Shirt looks and feels like cotton seersucker, but its performance fabric wicks moisture and dries fast so you stay comfy hiking and traveling.
